page.title: 17OUR SCHOOL LOLLIPOP MAN.
page.content: Our lollipop man was born in 1914 and has lived in Inkberrow all of his life.He has been lollipop man at Inkberrow school for fourteen years.He attended Inkberrow school as a boy when he was five and left at fourteen. He was only absent twice in all that time.For good attendance he was given five shillings,which was a lot of money in those days.The teachers were very strict and the headmaster had a thin cane and a thick cane which he frequently used.When they played football against Cookhill school,three miles away,the boys would run all the way after the headmaster on his bicycle,play the game and run all the way back again. We shall all miss our lollipop man when he retires this year.
